titlestmt.titleproper: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1
A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1 FA781

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:52:04 -0400.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Vice Presidential records, Advance Office, Series 1

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. Office of the Vice President

physdesc.extent: 17 legal document boxes, 1 half legal document box.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: These records are in two subseries, 1-Events and 2-Vice Presidential Staff Correspondence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Reproduction/duplication of archival items is routinely provide in accordance with "fair use." If the RAC does not hold copyright for an archival collection or tems within a collection, it is the user's responsibility to contact the copyright holder, or make a fair effort to do so, prior to publication.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Types of records include: correspondence, travel logs, brochures and pamphlets, photographs, newspaper articles, and guest lists.
